## Hop.users property

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly users: {
		me: {
			get(): Promise<{
				projects: Project[];
				user: User;
				project_member_role_map: Record<`project_${string}`, MemberRole>;
				leap_token: string | null;
			}>;
			pats: {
				create(name: string): Promise<PAT>;
				getAll(): Promise<PAT[]>;
				delete(id: `pat_${string}`): Promise<void>;
			};
		};
	};
```
